alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:32PM CDT until August 05 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT/700 PM CDT/ FOR SOUTHERN CHEYENNE...NORTHWESTERN THOMAS... SOUTHWESTERN RAWLINS AND NORTHERN SHERMAN COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS... At 532 PM MDT/632 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of St. Francis, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bird City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
